entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming east 20 before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023
